src:
日テレ、史上初の５連覇…なでしこリーグ通算１７Ｖ

02 Nov 2019, 06:02

　サッカーのなでしこリーグは２日、各地で最終節が行われ、日テレがマイナビ仙台に４―０で快勝し、史上初となる５連覇を達成した。通算では１７度目の優勝。
　仙台市のユアテックスタジアム仙台で行われた試合で、日テレは４０分過ぎ、ＦＷ小林のゴールで先制。６０分頃に小林がクロスを頭で合わせて２点目を決めると、終了間際には、さらに２点を追加した。
text:
NTV, the first ever fifth consecutive victory ... Nadeshiko League 17V

02 Nov 2019, 06:02

On the 2nd of the soccer Nadeshiko League, the final round was held in various places, and NTV won 4-0 against Mynavi Sendai, achieving the first ever fifth straight win. This is the 17th victory in total.
In a match held at Your Tech Stadium Sendai in Sendai, NTV passed 40 minutes and FW Kobayashi scored first. Around 60 minutes, Kobayashi put the cross with his head and decided the second point, and added two more points just before the end.
